mapper.update:
update tbl_transaction_remark
note_content = #{noteContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
edit_flag = #{editFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
tran_id = #{tranId,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_transaction_remark set note_content = #{noteContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, edit_flag = #{editFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, tran_id = #{tranId,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_transaction_remark (id, note_content, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, edit_flag, tran_id) values
(#{transactionRemark.id}, #{transactionRemark.noteContent}, #{transactionRemark.createBy}, #{transactionRemark.createTime}, #{transactionRemark.editBy}, #{transactionRemark.editTime}, #{transactionRemark.editFlag}, #{transactionRemark.tranId})
mapper.select: select tr.id, tr.note_content, u1.name as create_by, tr.create_time, u2.name as edit_by, tr.edit_time, tr.edit_flag from tbl_transaction_remark tr inner join tbl_user u1 on u1.id = tr.create_by left join tbl_user u2 on u2.id = tr.edit_by where tr.tran_id = #{transactionId} order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_transaction_remark (id, note_content, create_by, create_time, edit_flag, tran_id) values (#{id}, #{noteContent}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{editFlag}, #{tranId})
